sentence.Network_en: Fernlike foliage and mottled wood used in cabinetry and veneering.
sentence.Network_cn: 蕨类植物的叶子和斑驳的木头用于细木家具制作和镶木的过程中.

sentence.Network_en: A fernlike, evergreen, southern African plant ( Asparagus setaceus ) having whitish flowers and red or purple - black berries.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种产于南非的厥状常青植物, ( 文竹 ) 开小白花,有红色或紫黑色干果仁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: a small cycad of the genus Ceratozamia having a short scaly woody trunk and fernlike foliage and woody cones ; Mexico .泽米属的一种小型苏铁，具有木质球果、鱼鳞状树干和蕨类叶片；分布在墨西哥。
fernleaf 蕨叶病, fernlike 似蕨叶的, fernley 弗恩利
fernlike 似蕨叶的, fernlike 蕨叶状的, fernlike 羊齿植物状的
fernley 弗恩利, fernlike 羊齿植物状的, fernlike 似蕨叶的

means.word_mean: 1. resembling ferns especially in leaf shape;
